text: Józef Drzazga (1914–1978) was a Polish Catholic priest, bishop of Warmia from 1972 to 1978. He was the first post-World War II bishop on that post. He has been a titular bishop of Sinidado in Warmia since 1958. |- Category:1914 births Category:1978 deaths Category:Bishops of Warmia Category:Participants in the Second Vatican Council Category:20th-century Roman Catholic bishops
title: Józef Drzazga
